net.sourceforge.metrics.ui
Class AbortMetrics

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.AbortMetrics
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate, org.eclipse.ui.IObjectActionDelegate
public class AbortMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IObjectActionDelegate, Constants

Action for the checked menu item in the IJavaproject popup. Checks/Unchecks based on the presence of the metrics nature and selection adds/removes the nature.

Author:
Frank Sauer
